item.description:
Dear Prospective Improvisers,

This rehearsal marks yet another chance for all those interested to improvise, entertain, and laugh as Ensemble B improvisers! Over the course of our past several casting calls, several individuals have shown enthusiasm and delivered great work. Our task now is to get all of you together.

As always, warmups, drills, and games will drive this rehearsal. We will focus on performance rather than critique. If you are serious abiout improv and helping others, mark this event in your calendar!

See you then!
Harish

group.name: Great Boston Chapter of Laughing Matter - Auditions Circle

item.name: Open Rehearsal - Ensemble B Casting Call 3
